verbs.description: [V: Bless] [ARG1: you] , [ARGM-DIS: Rudy Giuliani] , [ARGM-DIS: you glorious fool] . This is where we are : When one of the president 's lawyers tells the truth , it 's blockbuster news . That 's what happened Wednesday night when Giuliani , a relative newcomer to President Trump 's ever - rotating legal team , went on Hannity for what should have been another softball interview . To everyone 's surprise , Giuliani announced that President Trump reimbursed his attorney Michael Cohen the $ 130,000 ...
